How do people usually tune the prompt of the gpt-3 summerisation api?
How do people usually tune the prompt of the gpt-3 summerisation api?

There is no one-size-fits-all answer to this question, as the amount of tuning required will vary depending on the specific task and data set. However, some tips for tuning the prompt of the gpt-3 summerisation api include: starting with a broad prompt that covers a range of topics, refining the prompt based on the results of the initial runs, and using a variety of different prompt types (e.g., question, command, statement) to cover different aspects of the data set.

There is no one-size-fits-all answer to this question, as the optimal prompt will vary depending on the specific data and task at hand. However, some tips for tuning the prompt of the GPT-3 summerization API include:

-Start with a general prompt that describes the overall topic or goal of the summerization.

-Make sure the prompt is specific enough to guide the model in the right direction, but not so specific that it constrains the model too much.

- experiment with different prompts and see what works best for your specific data and task.
